Methods.method_description: Implemented to attempt a recovery from an error noted in an application-modal dialog.

params.param_description: An NSError object that describes the error, including error recovery options.
The index of the user selected recovery option in error's localized recovery array.

Methods.method_declar: func attemptRecovery(fromError error: Error, optionIndex recoveryOptionIndex: Int) -> Bool

return_description: true if the error recovery was completed successfully, false otherwise.

Methods.method_description: Implemented to attempt a recovery from an error noted in a document-modal sheet.

params.param_description: An NSError object that describes the error, including error recovery options.
The index of the user selected recovery option in error’s localized recovery array.
An object that is the modal delegate.
A selector identifying the method implemented by the modal delegate.
Arbitrary data associated with the attempt at error recovery, to be passed to delegate in didRecoverSelector.

Methods.method_declar: func attemptRecovery(fromError error: Error, optionIndex recoveryOptionIndex: Int, delegate: Any?, didRecoverSelector: Selector?, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)

Methods.method_description: An NSFileManager object sends this message to its handler for each error it encounters when copying, moving, removing, or linking files or directories. DeprecatedSee delegate methods for copy, move, remove, and link methods.

params.param_description: A dictionary that contains two or three pieces of information (all NSString objects) related to the error:KeyValue@"Path"The path related to the error (usually the source path)@"Error"A description of the error@"ToPath" The destination path (not all errors)

Methods.method_declar: func fileManager(_ fm: FileManager, shouldProceedAfterError errorInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]) -> Bool

return_description: true if the operation (which is often continuous within a loop) should proceed, otherwise false.

Methods.method_description: An NSFileManager object sends this message to a handler immediately before attempting to move, copy, rename, or delete, or before attempting to link to a given path.DeprecatedSee delegate methods for copy, move, link, and remove methods.

params.param_description: The path or a file or directory that manager is about to attempt to move, copy, rename, delete, or link to.

Methods.method_declar: func fileManager(_ fm: FileManager, willProcessPath path: String)
